Final Flight Selection

1. Bear Lake, Canada - ocean water, vegetation, some soil and ice
2. Holstein, Switzerland - vegetation, few buildings and soil
3. Kurnool, India - soil and vegetation
4. McKenzie River, Canada - river water and vegetation
5. MS River, US - vegetation, river water, soil
6. Munich, Germany - vegetation and buildings
7. Pavicharam, India - water and some limited buildings and soil
8. San Fransisco Bay, US - buildings, soil, water
9. Charleston, WV, US - some buildings, vegetation, river
10. Greenland Coast - ice and limited soil
11. Neu Ulm, Germany - buildings and vegetation
12. Northern Alaska, US - soil, ocean water, limited vegetation
13. Saskatchewan, Canada - soil, vegetation, and small patches of lake
14.
